outputs.output_descr: China is prone to almost all kinds of natural disasters and the casualties and economic loss. This project is designed to reach to objects: 1) key agencies have constant access to up-to-date accurate and efficient disaster management information; 2) key government departments enabled to implement the National Natural Disaster Reduction Plan of China in a coordinated, systematic and pragmatic manner.

project_descr: Capacity Development for China Disaster Reduction Actions
